SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.gridgain.grid.cache
Annotation Type GridCacheName

@Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
public @interface GridCacheName

Allows to specify cache name from grid computations. It is used to provide cache name for affinity routing of grid computations, such as GridJob, Runnable, Callable, or GridClosure. It should be used only in conjunction with @GridCacheAffinityMapped annotation, and should be attached to a method or field that provides cache name for the computation. Only one annotation per class is allowed. In the absence of this annotation, the default no-name cache will be used for providing key-to-node affinity.

Refer to @GridCacheAffinityMapped documentation for more information and examples about this annotation.

GridCacheAffinityMapped
